{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_PoisonBagCheck}} '''A_PoisonBagCheck'''
(no parameters)
A very specialized form of [[A_Countdown]].
It decreases by one the calling actor's <tt>special1</tt> field. If this field becomes negative or null, the calling actor is jumps to its Death state. Otherwise, nothing else happens.
This codepointer is restricted to actors deriving from {{Class|PoisonCloud}} because the special1 field might be used for different purposes by other classes or restricted codepointers.
==Examples== See {{Class|PoisonCloud}} for an example.
